title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.

_No response_

title: [PR] feat(providers): add model capability tier to ModelProperties (#700)
summary:
## Problem
The FILL exemplar phase falls back to LLM-generated exemplars when the corpus has no match. Small models (<=8B params like qwen3:4b) copy exemplar *content* verbatim instead of abstracting *style*, contaminating prose with exemplar imagery. Test data showed LLM-generated exemplars leaked

**AI/LLM**: 3-tier fallback chain (Ollama → HuggingFace → Gemini) with 80% cache hit
